activateTokenMinHoldTime(uint8[],bool).details: Tells you if the minimum hold time rule is active or not.

params._on: boolean representing if the rule is active

getTokenMinHoldTimePeriod(uint8).details: Get the minimum hold time rule hold hours

returns._0: period minimum amount of time to hold the asset

isTokenMinHoldTimeActive(uint8).details: function to check if Minumum Hold Time is active

setTokenMinHoldTime(uint8[],uint32).details: Set the TokenMinHoldTime. Restricted to rule administrators only.

setTokenMinHoldTimeFull(uint8[],uint32[].details: Set the setAccountMinMaxTokenBalanceRule suite. Restricted to rule administrators only.

params._actions: actions to have the rule applied to
params._minHoldTimeHours: min hold time in hours corresponding to the actions

setTokenMinHoldTime(uint8[],uint32).notice: that setting a rule will automatically activate it.

setTokenMinHoldTimeFull(uint8[],uint32[].notice: that setting a rule will automatically activate it.
